oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Gulistān : manuscript, 1727?
Gulistān
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Saʻdī
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Widener Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Written in one column (in black and red ink) and two columns (in red ink), 29 lines per page.
With 19 miniatures in color, of which 9 are portraits of the Mogul emperors, from Timur to Mohammad Shah.
Two ownership statements on f. 1r signed al-Yadghar Shāh (dated 1118 AH [1706 or 7 AD]) and Muḥammad Saʻīd (dated 1120 AH [1708 or 9 AD]).
MS Persian 62. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Persian poetry--747-1500
Sufi poetry, Persian
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: گلستان
گلستان : مخطوطة، 1727?
